location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to Major David Wilson, Political Resident in the Gulph [Gulf] of Persia, from William Sowden Collinson, Commander of Indian Naval Squadron in the Persian Gulph [Gulf]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: stain on upper half recto of folio 2 makes reading text difficult.

mods.abstract: The letter is a status update, arranged in six numbered paragraphs. It details the journey of HMS Challengerto Muskat [Muscat] on 9 September 1830. It also describes the difficult passage of the Elphinstonefrom Bombay, including an unscheduled stop at the Seychelle Islands. Difficulties experienced by the stand-in Agent of Sharja [Sharjah] are also alluded to, but few details are provided.
